attributes.action: Let us have fish raffles aswell as meat ones please, it's a basic right.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I woud hearby like to request that in these hear towns of the County of Yorkshire, that not only do they have meat raffles but fish ones aswell. As us fish eaters feel left out, we have to endure the meaty smiles of meat eaters as they win again and again. While us Fish eater are becoming skint, due to the exessive drinking we do to ease the pain put upon us by our meaty cousins.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
